meanings.definition: A television program or channel that sells products directly to viewers.
meanings.sent1: I watched a teleshops about kitchen gadgets last night.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy buying jewelry from teleshops.
meanings.sent3: The teleshops for exercise equipment made me want to start working out.
meanings.sent4: Her room looked like a teleshops with all the products neatly displayed.
meanings.sent5: The teleshops for pet supplies was so colorful and inviting.

meanings.definition: The act of purchasing goods or services through a television program or channel.
meanings.sent1: My mom loves teleshops and buys something every time she watches.
meanings.sent2: Teleshops make shopping from home convenient.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally bought a teleshops for a vacuum cleaner while half asleep.
meanings.sent4: His addiction to teleshops was draining his bank account.
meanings.sent5: The teleshops for beauty products had amazing deals.
